TextView.android:text:  “The application will help you in understanding your status of surrounding Floral Diversity and its contribution in Carbon Sequestration in your area.  The Application is developed under the ICSSR IMPRESS Project titled as “Transformative Urban Regions: Governing Accessibility, Liveability and Sustainability in the Megacity Regions” and University of Mumbai Biodiversity Audit Committee.  The result displayed as inbuilt data are collected and surveyed by Mumbai University Community.  The result displayed as an output provided by user inputs totally depend on User’s understanding and information.  The visualisation is for the better understanding of spatial distribution of green space and importance of it, around you or the surveyed location by Users.  The Visualisation of data can only be used for research and / or awareness and not for any legal claims*
